Car Help Help for Smart Car Version 1.0, by Group3:Jieli Zhang\n
1,Click the icon of Car on the Toolbar, Smart Automobile screen will be displayed with a list of Temperature, Radio, GPS and Lights items.\n 2,Click any of the listed item which you want to set,it will display you the setting screen respectively.\n 3,Following the prompt on each screen,you will set all the settings of the car.
//----------- Strings for kitchen---------------- Smart Kitchen Help Help for Smart Kitchen Control Version 1.0, by Group3:Chao Gu\n
1,Click the icon of SmartKitchen on the Toolbar, Smart Kitchen Control Panel screen will be displayed with a list of Appliances.\n 2,Click any of the appliances which you want to set,it will display you the setting screen respectively. As well, click the add button will allow you to add more appliances, the delete button allows you to remove a appliance from the list.\n 3,Following the prompt on each screen,you will set all the settings of the specific appliance.
